task.summary: Default task
* Updated copyright year to 2016 * Re-arranged changelog entries in `readme.txt` and `changelog.txt` files

* Update SlickNav library to version 1.0.6
* Updated `normalize.css` to version 3.0.3
* Removed WordPress 4.1 compatibility check for `<title />` usage
- inline IDE comments and spelling corrections/additions

- update inline documentation

MESSAGE.value: * Refactored `OpusPrimusComments::comments_link` to use the WordPress core more effectively * Added two classes for use in rendering the comments link text displayed ... or not * Added class definition to hide comment link text when comments are closed and there are no comments
* Added `opus_authors_list` filter hook * Added `Share the Author Wealth` method, not implemented as a display element, yet
- update `readme.txt` to include "changelog.txt" content
* Adjust breadcrumb font-size (reduced by 1px) to correct wrapping effect
* Added context (`_x`) for complete byline phrase translation string
* Improved i18n implementation in search found results string - updated language files
- minor comment/inline documentation updates
- changed `opus-primus.po` extension to `.pot`
- merged "no-stanzas" branch
- minor `readme.txt` update
- correct Text Domain (and a few other minor items)
* Updated copyright year to 2016 * Re-arranged changelog entries in `readme.txt` and `changelog.txt` files
* Minor code reformatting
* Update SlickNav library to version 1.0.6
* Updated `normalize.css` to version 3.0.3
* Removed WordPress 4.1 compatibility check for `<title />` usage
- inline IDE comments and spelling corrections/additions
* Changed aperture from `F` to `f /`
- update inline documentation
Begin implementating more strict adherence to WordPress Coding Standards
- begin implementating more strict adherence to WordPress Coding Standards
* Removed `OpusPrimusDefaults` class
- begin better adherence to the WordPress Coding Standards
* Changed `get_posts` call to `new WP_Query` in `Opus_Primus_Structures::copyright`
- improved adherence to WordPress Coding Standards
